com.netflix.genie.server.persistence
Class QueryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.genie.server.persistence.QueryBuilder

public class QueryBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

A builder class, which helps simplify building of complex queries.
Defaults are: paginate=true, page=0, orderByUpdateTime=true, desc=true, and limit=PersistenceManager.MAX_PAGE_SIZE.
